main.title: CabinMap | Flight Seat Booking UI
main.description: Choose your preferred seat for your upcoming flight with our easy-to-use seat selection page. View the cabin layout, select available seats, and fly in comfort.

extra_legroom.title: Extra Legroom
extra_legroom.description: Extra legroom seats provide additional space to stretch your legs, often located near exit or bulkhead rows.

regular.title: Regular
regular.description: Regular seats include standard window, aisle, or middle seats. These do not include exit or extra legroom rows.

unavailable.title: Unavailable
unavailable.description: This seat is currently not available for selection, either occupied or restricted.

selected.title: Selected
selected.description: The seat you have currently selected.

previously_selected.title: Previously Selected
previously_selected.description: Seat that was selected in a previous session or by another traveler in your group.

exit.title: Exit
exit.description: Indicates the location of an emergency exit door.

characteristics.L: Experience more space and comfort with extra legroom seats where available.

limitations.NEXT_TO_EXIT_DOOR: This seat is located next to an emergency exit and may require assisting in emergency situations.
limitations.NOT_ALLOWED_FOR_INFANT: This seat is not allowed for infants.
limitations.NOT_ALLOWED_FOR_PASSENGER_WITH_MEDICAL_C: This seat is not allowed for passengers with medical conditions, impairments, or special needs.

labels.agreement: I have read and agree to the terms and conditions
